speaker: Tutor
dialogue: On the left-hand side of your screen, there is a blue toolbar.

speaker: Tutor
dialogue: We're going to practice using some of those tools so you know how to use them as we're thinking together.

speaker: Tutor
dialogue: If you click on the pencil button, which is the third one down, there'll be a box that pops up with a color and size box if you want to change the color or size of anything that you're drawing.
